trans-unit.source: Serves as the abstract base class for validation controls that perform typed comparisons.
trans-unit.target: 作为执行类型化的比较的验证控件的抽象基类。

trans-unit.source: The BaseCompareValidator class is inherited by validation controls that compare values, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator> controls, to provide basic common functionality.
trans-unit.target: BaseCompareValidator 类继承的验证控件所比较的值，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator>控件，以提供基本的通用功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Type%2A> property to specify the data type that that the values are converted to before being compared.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Type%2A>属性以指定的数据类型的值转换为在比较之前。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value of the input control being validated cannot be converted to the specified data type, validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果正在验证的输入控件的值无法转换为指定的数据类型，验证将失败。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A> property of the validation control is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>验证控件的属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The BaseCompareValidator class also contains several static properties and methods that are useful when performing comparison validations.
trans-unit.target: BaseCompareValidator 类还包含几个静态属性和方法时执行比较验证非常有用。

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether a string can be converted to a specific data type by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CanConvert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以确定是否可以通过使用转换为特定的数据类型 string<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CanConvert%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CanConvert%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CutoffYear%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中包含可以用两位数年份表示的最大年份<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CutoffYear%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CutoffYear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.GetFullYear%2A> method allows you to convert a two-digit year to a four-digit year.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.GetFullYear%2A>方法允许你将两位数年份转换为四位数年份。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.GetFullYear%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you use validator controls that derive from the BaseCompareValidator control inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 当你使用派生自 BaseCompareValidator 控件的验证程序控件<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制，请确保该验证程序控件与之关联的控件位于同一面板。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>，控制为部分页面更新，请参阅[局部页面呈现概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: For more information about validation controls, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator>.
trans-unit.target: 有关验证控件的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator>

trans-unit.source: Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines.
trans-unit.target: 辅助功能默认情况下，对于此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，如 Web 内容辅助功能准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级别 1 准则。

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator> class is abstract, you cannot create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator> object directly.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator>类为抽象类，无法创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator>直接对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly called by the constructor of a derived class to initialize the properties defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数通常用于初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator>中定义的属性的派生类的构造函数调用

trans-unit.source: Adds the HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered for the control to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将 HTML 特性和需要呈现到指定控件的样式添加<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The AddAttributesToRender method is used to render the attributes of the control in the HTML tag for the control.
trans-unit.target: AddAttributesToRender 方法用于呈现控件的 HTML 标记中控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> output stream for a control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常重写由控件开发人员在派生类中，若要将适当的特性和样式<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>控件的输出流。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，它表示要在客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified string can be converted to the specified data type.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可以转换为指定的数据类型的指定的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded method tests currency, double, and date values using the format used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的重载的方法测试货币、 double 和使用使用当前区域性的格式的日期值。

trans-unit.source: Use the CanConvert method to determine whether the specified string can be converted to the specified data type.
trans-unit.target: CanConvert 方法用于确定是否可以转换为指定的数据类型的指定的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test whether a string can be converted to a compatible data type before performing an operation that depends on that data type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常用于测试是否在执行依赖于该数据类型的操作之前，可将字符串转换为兼容的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: This version of the method tests the value using the format used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的方法测试使用当前区域性所使用的格式的值。

trans-unit.source: To test the value using a culture-neutral format, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CanConvert%28System.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> overloaded version of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要测试使用的非区域性特定格式的值，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CanConvert%28System.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>重载此方法的版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CanConvert%28System.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%2CSystem.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The string to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的字符串。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified data string can be converted to the specified data type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的数据字符串可以转换为指定的数据类型;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified string can be converted to the specified data type.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可以转换为指定的数据类型的指定的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded method allows you to specify whether values are tested using a culture-neutral format.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的重载方法，可指定是否使用非特定于区域性的格式对值进行测试。

trans-unit.source: Use the CanConvert method to determine whether the specified string can be converted to the specified data type.
trans-unit.target: CanConvert 方法用于确定是否可以转换为指定的数据类型的指定的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test whether a string can be converted to a compatible data type before performing an operation that depends on that data type.
trans-unit.target: 此方法通常用于测试是否在执行依赖于该数据类型的操作之前，可将字符串转换为兼容的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that values should be tested using a culture-neutral format, pass in `true` for the `cultureInvariant` parameter; otherwise, values are tested using the format used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示应使用的非区域性特定格式测试值，请传入`true`为`cultureInvariant`参数; 否则，值使用测试使用当前区域性的格式。

trans-unit.source: When testing a value using the format used by the current culture, consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CanConvert%28System.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%29?displayProperty=fullName> overloaded version of this method.
trans-unit.target: 当测试使用当前区域性所使用的格式的值，请考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CanConvert%28System.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%29?displayProperty=fullName>重载此方法的版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CanConvert%28System.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The string to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的字符串。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to test values using a culture-neutral format; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要测试使用非特定于区域性的格式; 的值否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified data string can be converted to the specified data type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的数据字符串可以转换为指定的数据类型;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compares two strings using the specified operator and data type.
trans-unit.target: 将使用指定的运算符和数据类型的两个字符串进行比较。

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded method compares currency, double, and date values using the format used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的重载的方法进行比较货币、 double 和使用使用当前区域性的格式的日期值。

trans-unit.source: The Compare method is used to test whether the value of the `leftText` parameter relates to the value of the `rightText` parameter in the manner specified by the `op` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Compare 方法用于测试是否的值`leftText`参数与值`rightText`参数以指定方式`op`参数。

trans-unit.source: The `type` parameter specifies the data type of the values being compared.
trans-unit.target: `type`参数指定要比较的值的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the `op` parameter is set to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, this method tests only the value of the `leftText` parameter for the data type specified by the `type` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果`op`参数设置为`ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`，此方法可测试的值`leftText`由指定的数据类型的参数`type`参数。

trans-unit.source: The `rightText` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: `rightText`参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This version of the method compares the values using the format used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的方法将使用当前区域性所使用的格式的值进行比较。

trans-unit.source: To compare the values using a culture-neutral format, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Compare%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%29?displayProperty=fullName> overloaded version of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将使用的非区域性特定格式的值进行比较，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Compare%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%29?displayProperty=fullName>重载此方法的版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Compare%28System.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value on the left side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: 运算符左侧值。

trans-unit.source: The value on the right side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: 运算符右侧值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: if the leftValue parameter relates to the rightValue parameter in the manner specified by the op parameter; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 leftValue 参数与 rightValue 参数以指定方式 op 参数; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Compares two strings using the specified operator and validation data type.
trans-unit.target: 将使用指定的运算符和验证数据类型的两个字符串进行比较。

trans-unit.source: This version of the overload allows you to specify whether values are compared using a culture-neutral format.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的重载允许你指定是否使用非特定于区域性的格式对值进行比较。

trans-unit.source: The Compare method is used to test whether the value of the `leftText` parameter relates to the value of the `rightText` parameter in the manner specified by the `op` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Compare 方法用于测试是否的值`leftText`参数与值`rightText`参数以指定方式`op`参数。

trans-unit.source: The `type` parameter specifies the data type of the values being compared.
trans-unit.target: `type`参数指定要比较的值的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the `op` parameter is set to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, this method tests only the value of the `leftText` parameter for the data type specified by the `type` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果`op`参数设置为`ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`，此方法可测试的值`leftText`由指定的数据类型的参数`type`参数。

trans-unit.source: The `rightText` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: `rightText`参数将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that values should be compared using a culture-neutral format, pass in `true` for the `cultureInvariantLeftText` and `cultureInvariantRightText` parameters; otherwise, the values are compared using the format used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示应使用非特定于区域性的格式来比较值，请传入`true`为`cultureInvariantLeftText`和`cultureInvariantRightText`参数; 否则，使用当前区域性所使用的格式比较值。

trans-unit.source: When comparing values using the format used by the current culture, consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Compare%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%29?displayProperty=fullName> overloaded version of this method.
trans-unit.target: 比较使用使用当前区域性的格式的值时，请考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Compare%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%29?displayProperty=fullName>重载此方法的版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Compare%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value on the left side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: 运算符左侧值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to convert the left side value to a culture-neutral format; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>将左侧值转换为非特定于区域性的格式;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value on the right side of the operator.
trans-unit.target: 运算符右侧值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to convert the right side value to a culture-neutral format; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>将右侧值转换为非特定于区域性的格式;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: if the leftValue parameter relates to the rightValue parameter in the manner specified by the op parameter; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 leftValue 参数与 rightValue 参数以指定方式 op 参数; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified text into an object of the specified data type.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的文本转换为指定的数据类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded method converts currency, double, and date values using the format used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的重载的方法将货币、 double 和使用使用当前区域性的格式的日期值。

trans-unit.source: The Convert method is used to convert text into an object of the specified data type.
trans-unit.target: 转换方法用于将文本转换为指定的数据类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: Although the method returns `true` or `false` to indicate whether the conversion was successful, the converted value is stored in the `value` `out` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 尽管该方法返回`true`或`false`若要指示转换是否成功，转换后的值存储在`value``out`参数。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the conversion is unsuccessful, the `value` parameter is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果转换失败，`value`参数设置为`null`。

trans-unit.source: This version of the method converts values using the format used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的方法将使用当前区域性所使用的格式的值。

trans-unit.source: To convert values using a culture-neutral format, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Convert%28System.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Object%40%29?displayProperty=fullName> overloaded version of this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要转换使用的非区域性特定格式的值，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Convert%28System.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Object%40%29?displayProperty=fullName>重载此方法的版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Convert%28System.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Object%40%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的文本。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an object with the conversion result.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含具有转换结果的对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数传递时未经初始化。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the conversion is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果转换成功，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified text into an object of the specified data type.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的文本转换为指定的数据类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: This version of the overloaded method allows you to specify whether values are converted using a culture-neutral format.
trans-unit.target: 此版本的重载方法，可指定是否使用非特定于区域性的格式转换值。

trans-unit.source: The Convert method is used to convert text into an object of the specified data type.
trans-unit.target: 转换方法用于将文本转换为指定的数据类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: Although the method returns `true` or `false` to indicate whether the conversion was successful, the converted value is stored in the `value``out` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 尽管该方法返回`true`或`false`若要指示转换是否成功，转换后的值存储在`value``out`参数。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the conversion is unsuccessful, the `value` parameter is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果转换失败，`value`参数设置为`null`。

trans-unit.source: To indicate that values should be converted using a culture-neutral format, pass in `true` for the `cultureInvariant` parameter; otherwise, values are converted using the format used by the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 若要指示应使用非特定于区域性的格式转换值，请传入`true`为`cultureInvariant`参数; 否则，值将转换使用使用当前区域性的格式。

trans-unit.source: When converting a value using the format used by the current culture, consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Convert%28System.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%2CSystem.Object%40%29?displayProperty=fullName> overloaded version of this method.
trans-unit.target: 当将值使用当前区域性所使用的格式转换，请考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Convert%28System.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%2CSystem.Object%40%29?displayProperty=fullName>重载此方法的版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.Convert%28System.String%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType%2CSystem.Object%40%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The text to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的文本。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to convert values to a culture-neutral format; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要将值转换为非特定于区域性的格式;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an object with the conversion result.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，包含具有转换结果的对象。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 此参数传递时未经初始化。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the conversion is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果转换成功，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether values are converted to a culture-neutral format before being compared.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在比较之前转换为非特定于区域性的格式值。

trans-unit.source: When the CultureInvariantValues property is set to `true`, properties of the control that are not strongly typed are converted to a culture-neutral format before being compared.
trans-unit.target: 当 CultureInvariantValues 属性设置为`true`，控件的不强类型的属性之前都被转换为非特定于区域性的格式进行比较。

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, values are converted to the format of the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`false`，值转换为当前区域性的格式。

trans-unit.source: The CultureInvariantValues property does not affect values that are entered by users of the control on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: CultureInvariantValues 属性不会影响由该控件在网页上的用户输入的值。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or by style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 无法设置此属性，通过主题或样式表主题。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to convert values to a culture-neutral format before they are compared; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要将值转换为非特定于区域性的格式之前对它们进行比较;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 获取可以用两位数年份表示的最大年份。

trans-unit.source: Use the CutoffYear property to determine the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year in a 100-year range.
trans-unit.target: CutoffYear 属性用于确定可以用两位数年份中的 100 年范围内表示的最大年份。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this property contains the value `2029`, you can represent the years 1930 to 2029 using a two-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果此属性包含值`2029`，您可以表示 1930 年到 2029年使用两位数年份。

trans-unit.source: The two-digit year 30 is interpreted as 1930, while 29 is interpreted as 2029.
trans-unit.target: 两位数年份 30 被解释为 1930，而 29 被解释为 2029年。

trans-unit.source: You cannot change the value of this property directly; however, you can change the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year by setting the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 不能直接; 更改此属性的值但是，可以更改可以通过设置两位数年份表示的最大年份<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 可以用两位数年份表示的最大年份。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the validation control can be rendered for a newer ("uplevel") browser.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可以为较新的 （"上级"） 浏览器呈现验证控件。

trans-unit.source: The DetermineRenderUplevel method is a helper function used primarily by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.RenderUplevel%2A> property to determine whether the client's browser supports "uplevel" rendering (rendering on a newer browser).
trans-unit.target: DetermineRenderUplevel 方法是主要由一个帮助器函数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.RenderUplevel%2A>属性来确定客户端的浏览器是否支持"上一级"呈现 （在较新的浏览器上呈现）。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.RenderUplevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator> class overrides this method to return `false` if the current culture uses a non-Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator>类重写此方法以返回`false`当前区域性如果使用非公历日历。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 主要由控件开发人员使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation control can be rendered for an "uplevel" browser; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果验证控件可以呈现为"上级"浏览器中;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines the order in which the month, day, and year appear in a date value for the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 确定在其中年、 月和日，出现在当前区域性的日期值的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The month, day, and year of a date value can appear in different orders depending on the current culture settings.
trans-unit.target: 日期值的年、 月和日，可以出现在不同的顺序，具体取决于当前的区域性设置。

trans-unit.source: The GetDateElementOrder method is used to determine the order in which these values appear.
trans-unit.target: GetDateElementOrder 方法用于确定这些值的显示的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different values returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了此方法返回的不同值。

trans-unit.source: |Date element order|Return value| |------------------------|------------------| |Day, Month, Year|"dmy"| |Month, Day, Year|"mdy"| |Year, Month, Day|"ymd"|
A string that represents the order in which the month, day, and year appear in a date value for the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 表示年、 月和日，显示的顺序中的当前区域性的日期值的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Generates the four-digit year representation of the specified two-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 生成指定的两位数年份的四位数年份表示。

trans-unit.source: Use the GetFullYear method to generate the four-digit year representation of the specified two-digit year.
trans-unit.target: GetFullYear 方法用于生成指定的两位数年份的四位数年份表示。

trans-unit.source: The four-digit year representation depends on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CutoffYear%2A> property, which contains the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year in a 100-year range.
trans-unit.target: 四位数年份表示形式取决于值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CutoffYear%2A>属性，其中包含可以用两位数年份中的 100 年范围内表示的最大年份。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CutoffYear%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CutoffYear%2A> property contains the value `2029`, the GetFullYear method returns a year between 1930 and 2029.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CutoffYear%2A>属性包含值`2029`，GetFullYear 方法返回 1930年和 2029年之间的每一年。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseCompareValidator.CutoffYear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The two-digit year 30 is interpreted as 1930, while 29 is interpreted as 2029.
trans-unit.target: 两位数年份 30 被解释为 1930，而 29 被解释为 2029年。

trans-unit.source: You can change the maximum year that can be represented by a two-digit year by setting the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以更改可以通过设置两位数年份表示的最大年份<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because this method is `static`, you can use it without creating an instance of the class by qualifying the method name along with the class name--for example, `BaseCompareValidator.GetFullYear`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 由于此方法是`static`，你可以使用它而无需限定以及类名称-例如，该方法名称创建类的实例`BaseCompareValidator.GetFullYear`。

trans-unit.source: A two-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 两位数年份。

trans-unit.source: The four-digit year representation of the specified two-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 指定的两位数年份的四位数年份表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data type that the values being compared are converted to before the comparison is made.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要比较的值将转换为之前进行比较的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: Use the Type property to specify the data type used for comparison.
trans-unit.target: 类型属性用于指定用于比较的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The Type property is used differently by the various comparison validation controls.
trans-unit.target: 各种比较验证控件以不同方式使用类型属性。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When the Type property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType> and the current calendar type is non-Gregorian, the validator performs server-side validation only.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 时 Type 属性设为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType>并且当前日历类型是非公历，验证程序执行服务器端验证仅。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType>

trans-unit.source: The validator client script supports only Gregorian calendars.
trans-unit.target: 验证程序客户端脚本支持仅公历日历。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator> control, all values being compared (the upper bound, lower bound, and value of the input control) are converted to the specified data type before any comparison is performed.
trans-unit.target: 例如，在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator>控件，所有值进行比较 （上限，下限和输入控件的值） 将转换为指定的数据类型之前执行任何比较。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator>

trans-unit.source: However, if you use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator> control and set its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator.Operator%2A> property to `ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`, only the value of the input control is converted to the specified data type.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>控件并设置其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator.Operator%2A>属性`ValidationCompareOperator.DataTypeCheck`，仅输入控件的值转换为指定的数据类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator.Operator%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the value of the input control associated with the validation control cannot be converted to the specified data type, validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果与验证控件关联的输入控件的值无法转换为指定的数据类型，验证将失败。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A> property of the validation control is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>验证控件的属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the values that you can use for the Type property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用于类型属性的值。

trans-unit.source: |Data type|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`String`|Specifies a string data type.| |`Integer`|Specifies a 32-bit signed integer data type.| |`Double`|Specifies a double-precision floating-point number data type.| |`Date`|Specifies a date data type.| |`Currency`|Specifies a monetary data type.| This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: |数据类型 |说明 | |---------------|-----------------| |`String`|指定字符串数据类型。 | |`Integer`|指定 32 位有符号的整数数据类型。 | |`Double`|指定双精度浮点数字数据类型。 | |`Date`|指定日期数据类型。 | |`Currency`|指定的货币数据类型。 | 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref>枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified data type is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的数据类型不是之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationDataType"></xref>值。
